comment: #DYK the #flu virus can spread to others up to 6 feet away? Flu viruses spread mainly by droplets made when people with flu cough, sneeze, or talk. Staying home and keeping your distance from others if you have flu is the best way to protect others.https://t.co/ippVQhL2FH https://t.co/Hy4HjK2zJM
